Add, remove or edit an update site bookmark. Select the site(s) to search for features and patches.
Remote site: the url to a web site containing features Local site: a site that is on the current machine Archive size: a local site packaged as a ZIP or JAR file
You can turn on or off searching for features that don't match the environment (OS, locale, etc.)
Select one or more of the available updates to install.

For each feature to be installed, select an installation location from the presented choices, or add a new one. Due to co-location constraints, you may not be able to define a new location for some features.
